name: Satanic Nicholas
description:
Santa has become a tyrannical leader and now one lone elf has to stop him!!!!
Use E to transform between elf and Santa by putting on his hat. When in elf form you can use F to place down bombs which explode on contact with enemies. Bombs also explode if you press Q. In Santa form you can use R to dash forward, or F to use your sack slam. 

Defeat Santa's army of elves and save the day!

There is timer at the end so you can try to get the fastest time if you want :)

Also feel free to leave any constructive criticism or tips, it really helps us!
